document_data.title: The Drowned Tower
document_data.editor: [[Jennifer Clarke-Wilkes]], [[Claire Hoffman]], [[Chris Tulach]], [[Travis Woodall]]{{Cite adventurers league/The Drowned Tower|1}}
document_data.mainbody:
'''''The Drowned Tower''''' is an adventure module set in the ''Forgotten Realms'' using the ''Dungeons & Dragons'' 5{{th}} edition ruleset. It is part of the ''[[Adventurers League/Elemental Evil|Elemental Evil]]'' series of adventures published for the [[Adventurers League|D&D Adventurers League]]. It focuses on [[Mulmaster]], and is an adventure designed for three to seven 5{{th}}- to 10{{th}}-level characters.

{{Quote|''You are approached by someone claiming to be a member of the [[Brotherhood of the Cloak]] investigating unusual incidents involving some of his brethren. Discretion is vital, as there is rumored to be a link between the denizens of the [[Tower of Arcane Might]] and one of the elemental cults. Can you uncover the truth?''|}}
